title: Shield with Arabic Inscription and Signs of the Zodiac
medium: Iron alloy (steel), etched and overlaid with silver and gold; fabric lining
inscribed:
In Arabic, repeated around rim: "السلطان العالم السلطان العادل" 

"the sultan of the world, the sultan of justice" 

Read by Dr. Abdullah Ghouchani, winter 2014 and transcribed by Caitlin McKenna.
credit_line: Gift of Percy C. Madeira, Jr.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
